translations.description: (n.) Very small crypto balance, trace amount of cryptocurrency that's leftover after a trade or transaction.
Updated from "restos de criptomonedas"
DNT. Product name. It allows users to stake their top DeFi crypto tokens to earn staking rewards.

(n.) High-frequency trading (HFT) is a trading method that uses powerful computer programs to transact a large number of orders in fractions of a second. HFT uses complex algorithms to analyze multiple markets and execute orders based on market conditions.

(n.) High-frequency trading (HFT) is a trading method that uses powerful computer programs to transact a large number of orders in fractions of a second. HFT uses complex algorithms to analyze multiple markets and execute orders based on market conditions.

(n.) A structured set of strategic price levels used in grid trading, where a bot helps traders place buy and sell orders at predefined intervals within the grid to optimize trading based on market fluctuations.

(n.) The Welcome Bonus is aimed at new users. They can earn their bonus by trading a minimum amount.

(n.) The Welcome Pack is a series of Missions that Crypto.com App users can complete in their first 90 days to earn up to US$500 worth of token rewards.
(n.) The National Best Bid and Offer (NBBO) is the best bid and offer price for a security aggregated from among all exchanges in the country.

Widely recognized in the global financial sector and has a specific technical meaning

(n.) The same term applied for "native x". It is an integral part of the operation of the network protocol it is issued on. These tokens are created at the network's genesis and are often used to pay transaction fees or stake in DPoS systems.
